text: 8.38 Mat 10.33, Luk 9.26, Lom 1.16, 2 Ti 1.8 Binbɨ anɨb ñɨn ak, kɨli God nop kud ñɨl kelɨgɨl, tap nɨgep ma nɨgep tap tɨmel gup ogɨnap gɨpal agak. Bɨ an yɨp nebeŋ gɨnɨmuŋ tek lek nɨŋɨd, Jisas nop ma nepin, takaw ne ak ma nepin agɨnɨgab ak, kɨdek Bɨ Olap Ñɨne ne bɨ anɨb nop nɨgek nebeŋ gɨnɨgab agak. Ne Bapi mɨlek awl dɨl, ensel okok ayɨp ownɨgab ñɨn ak, bɨ anɨb ak nop pen abe ne Bapi nop agɨnɨgab, Nop ma nepin agɨnɨgab agak.
